Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Kristi D. Flanagan
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera yesterday. When I buy something I like to know all the features available. This camera explains all the features when you turn the wheel on the camera. It tells you what features are best for what you a taking a picture of.My husband was throwing my son in the air and this camera caught a perfect picture of them. It was not blurred at all.I am very excited to try the other features on the camera. It is a huge step up for me from my Kodak 4.0 megapixal camera.

Reviews.Title: A Camera With a Common Defect: Frozen Lens
Reviews.Author: Geospear-it "iiluvinoven"
Reviews.Content: First, we have a fellow Amazon customer who bought two SL202s, and both stopped functioning within a month; the issue? Frozen lens. Check out the comments to the review as well.[...]And from [...], the vast majority of SL202 problems are regarding frozen lens:  By sheazajames on Nov 02, 2009  When I attempt to turn on the camera the lens is not extending fully and then the camera is shutting done.  I can only review pic on memory card  By marielyouzta on Nov 02, 2009  The lens is still open, Whole camera is off, How can I take a picture now? Iv'e turned if on and of several  of times.  By hhuntsman959 on Oct 29, 2009  My samsung camera will not turn on. The lens is extended. When I push the power button the blue light comes  on, camera beeps, then light goes of. If i push the picture button a picture will come on for 3 seconds  then beeps and goes off.  By dave639 on Sep 06, 2009  When I press the power button it lights up, makes a loud beep and turns off again. Nothing comes on the screen.  When I press the display button, a stored image shows for a moment and then it makes the loud beep and turns  off. The lens will not retract.  By stingraye on Nov 14, 2009  the lens is stuck. it will not go in. also nothing is showing up on the display screen.Oh, and there's a guy on Ebay trying to pawn off his SL202 with stuck lens for it's repair parts value, which he apparently thinks is 40$.  Last updated on 01:37:07 PM PDT, Oct 22, 2009: [...]Frozen lens happened to them, it happened to me, and it could happen to you. I guess the take-away point here is not to buy an SL202; I won't be buying any kind of Samsung camera ever again...stuck lens seems like somewhat of a common problem with digital cams, but it seems like a much bigger issue with the SL202; it wasn't released too long ago, and there are so many people with the same problem over the past couple of months.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: B. BAKER
Reviews.Content: I've used the Samsung SL202 for about 2 weeks and I am quite happy with it.  The picture quality is very good, the viewing screen is excellent, and the camera was a good value for what it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Same issue as everyone else apparently
Reviews.Author: Todd Zverloff
Reviews.Content: I was thinking of buying this camera then I read all of the reviews about the lens freezing up. I went to a Walmart by my house to actually test some cameras out and they had two different colors of this model on display. Both of their displays had the lens stuck halfway out and would only turn on for a second before shutting back down. This is apparently quite a widespread problem.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Yun K. Lee "Yessica"
Reviews.Content: I have SAMSUNG TV but i have been never used samsung's camera so  hesitated to buy this.I checked out cameras at best but and compared them.Finally i choose this!It is cheap, small and light.Easy to use. I bought pink one, it's sooooooooooo cute!I love the beauty shot tool.If you use this, you don't need to use photoshop!If you want cheap,cute and good camera, i want to recommend this one strongly!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and I love it. I went to the store with my heart set on a Photosmart A100-IS from Canon but was disappointed with the bland colors and menu. I saw the Samsung SL202 and loved it. It is sleek and modern and just what I need from easy, quick shots or great firework videos. I am very glad I chose this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: S. Lopez
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised how great this camera was.  I never thought I would really like it.  I've had several Sony cameras and just couldn't afford the Sony I wanted.  This camera is better than the Sonys that I have owned.  I LOVE this camera, how it takes pictures.  It can be a little slow but I've experienced that with all digital cameras.  If you are in the market and considering this one... you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: What a bargain!
Reviews.Author: Ms Thea "emaven"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a birthday present for my 13 year old grandson. He loves it.  It was easy to learn use and takes great pictures.  It even does well in low light situations.  Its compact size makes it possible for him to carry it everywhere, and he does.  One drawback is that it did not come with memory. You have to remember to buy a memory card.  4GB is good. I paired this camera  with a Square trade warranty, but it is very sturdy.  We have not had to try it out. This was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Paul San Felipe
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung SL202 for my girlfriend as a Christmas Gift.  I looked hard and long to find a camera with great features, 10+ megapixel, and a nice shade shade of pink for the camera color.  In all, this camera is easy to use and for the price, it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Broke After 1 year
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these camera's first one was mine. I will admin it takes great photos but unfortunately broke just a little after 1 year. I would not purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Will not take pictures when the shutter button is pressed.
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Liles "Teacher"
Reviews.Content: Absolute worthless camera for taking any kind of pictures where time is of the essence. Be prepared for focus adjustments that can last several seconds. My 3 year old poses and moves very quickly and the Samsung SL202 will not respond quickly enough to get the shot. Ridiculously slow reaction time. Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: 1 year 5 month experience with  Samsung's SL202
Reviews.Author: Hamstersadancin
Reviews.Content: No stranger to the Point & Shoot camera arena.Handled P&S;'s from Nikon, Canon, Polaroid, Panasonic, Pentax, Vivitar, and Argus.Recieved the teal version of this model late xmas of 2009.So far my camera still works fine with no major issues.Only thing that's no more is the black paint on the bayonet ring, and the mid-section of the camera.Likes of the product:Less image noise, or none in most settings.Macro-mode very noticable detail in close objects.Portrait mode really does remove most of my imperfections.Program mode plenty of featuresGreat picture quality in lowlight conditions.Compact size.SLB-10A Li-ion battery is affordable.2hour video modeDislikes of the product:Mic doesn't capture audio good.Audio is chopped when zooming on video mode.Picture resolution cannot be reduced below 1.0 Megapixels(1024x768) unless in Motion Capture, or Video record/playback mode.Program mode - The Drive Functions ie: Continuous, Motion Capture, and AEB cannot be used with timer, or flash.Lanyard hole placement - It's placed on the the upper right(if looking at the back end) which is common.For a camera of this size it would've been better if the hole was placed in the middle(ie: Nikon Coolpix 600, Pentax Optio S) of where the USB port is for neck carry.Playback button turns on the camera. It's a convenient feature however when the camera is in very tight spaces like a pants pocket it'll turn on unoticed, and end up wasting the li-ion's battery power for any further shots.Recommended products for this camera:Gorilla podScreen protector for LCD.There was only one time  I have encountered  the stuck retractable lens issue.Out in the urban field I dropped my camera on the cement while on video record modeit beeped and then shut down. the lens was sure stuck, but after 15 minutes I slammed the retractable lens the opposite way in which it went back to working properly.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Canales "Canales"
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for a young person, still like the Canon SD750 a lot more though

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: jolene rafferty
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and i love it. It's totally easy to use and the picture quality is great. My daughter loves to use it as well and so im looking on here to buy her the same one. I love the fact that it does video with sound and it's small enough to put in my purse or pocket.. You would be making a great purches!

Reviews.Title: seems OK but why always red eyes?
Reviews.Author: Burcu Guven
Reviews.Content: It's been only 1 month since I purchased it. It seems fine up to now. I don't know if it's because of the camera itself, or if I have to change any settings or whatever, but people are always red-eyed in the pictures. I don't like that. I don't know if any other owners have the same problem with this camera.I really like Samsung products overall. That's why I bought this one. If you are looking for a good enough camera that is not so expensive, you might consider this one.

Reviews.Title: Good Product for the Price and Nice Features
Reviews.Author: Ahmed M. Shaik "Ahmed Shaik"
Reviews.Content: I Bought this camera from amazon site and the camera is good for normal daily use , i am using this camera regularly and i found that this is good for the price that is published and with nice feature , i recommend this product if you are looking for nice featureas within the budget price

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera SL202
Reviews.Author: Practical Woman
Reviews.Content: Bought as a birthday gift for my grand daughter.  I haven't seen the pictures yet, but the camera made her happy. I hope the images are as good as the experts predict they will be.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera...
Reviews.Author: Stork Nurse
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, love the beauty shot feature. Pics are blurry at times when zoomed in, and cannot adjust brightness of flash. However, it is very portable (you can fit it in your pocket) and when in focus, takes great pictures for a small point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: i bought this as a Christmas present to myself and I love it. easy to use.....takes great pictures.  Love It!!!

Reviews.Title: Great pics..
Reviews.Author: Rocky the bookworm. "R.Dawson"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about 3 months. I absolutely love it! I have 8month so you can imagine how many pics I take daily! I haven't had a problem with the lens getting stuck like a few others have commented. I am happy with my purchase! It takes absolutely amazing photos for a such a simple camera. My favorite feature is the "beauty shot" it hides blemishes :)

Reviews.Title: Great camera - no problems
Reviews.Author: A. Graham
Reviews.Content: Maybe it's just the grey ones that have a problem. Or just one bad lot.  I bought the SL202 this summer and have not had any problems with it at all. It has a lot of terrific features and takes crisp pictures. You can set everything to 'auto' and let the camera do the work, or use the manual settings.  The manual was readable enough to walk a first-time digital camera user like me through all of the different features.

Reviews.Title: Terrible camera!
Reviews.Author: Eagle
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of some positive reviews. But I was duped. something is wrong with the review system, it does not reflect the truth. Camera is very low quality, easily damaged, paint is peeling. You need to buy a memory card, only takes 2 pictures. The picture quality is so low. what is 10 megapixel? my old 1 megapixel camera took better pictures. Do not buy it used either! there is a reason it is cheap! and it is not cheap, Samsung robs people legally, alt these fake reviews. my sister bought a cam corder and it is piece of crap too. Neverbuy samsung again!

Reviews.Title: purchased twice - broken twice
Reviews.Author: R. Rogers
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera for my daughter's birthday.  it was broken within a month (camera lens stuck).  i knew getting it repaired or replaced would take a while, and figured it was just a fluke, so i decided to just purchase a second one while i sent in the first to get replaced.  less than two weeks after purchasing the second, it ALSO broke (same thing...camera lens stuck).  so, now i have two non-functioning samsung sl202 cameras to send in for repair.  any guesses whether i'll be replacing them with another sl202?

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: JD "JD"
Reviews.Content: This item came in great condition! Very good deal. I had only a small delay in getting it, but it was due to a UPS error. Nonetheless, this camera is a GREAT deal!

Reviews.Title: Missing information
Reviews.Author: S. Berman "Sylvia"
Reviews.Content: I used my camera for the first time yesterday and discovered that the cable included in the box is not useful for uploading to computer.  For some nutty reason, Samsung includes a cable that is only useful for uploading pictures and video to your TV.  Instead, you have to go out and buy a cable in order to install in PC.  The manual shows how to install this cable that they do not include - and does not include instructions on how to use the other cable.  Very surprising and makes me wonder what else I am going to find out.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.2-megapixel resolution for large, photo quality prints
3x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen
Digital image stabilization; Face detection
Perfect Portrait System: Face Detection, Smile Shot, Blink Detection, Beauty Shot
Capture images to SD/SDHC/MMC cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SL202 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
